references.paper_title: Building normalizing flows with stochastic interpolants
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel method for constructing normalizing flows using stochastic interpolants, which is highly relevant to the proposed METRIC FLOW MATCHING (MFM) framework.

references.paper_title: Gradient flows: in metric spaces and in the space of probability measures
references.reason: This book provides a comprehensive theoretical foundation for gradient flows in metric spaces and probability measures, which is crucial for understanding the mathematical underpinnings of the MFM framework.

references.paper_title: Latent space oddity: on the curvature of deep generative models
